tool_description: An API that fetches all the news from IGN.
name: IGN News
title: IGN News

api_list.name: Query Parameter Cheatsheet
api_list.description: A cheatsheet that shows all the possible query parameters
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ign-news.p.rapidapi.com/queryparams"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ign-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ign-news.p.rapidapi.com/queryparams"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ign-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get IGN news
api_list.description: Fetches news from IGN. Adding specific query parameters lets you filter and sort the news that gets returned.
